page.title: 19Employment in Pontyclun
page.content: The rapid growth of Pontyclun was attributable to the construction of the main South Wales railway line and the building of the local railway station.Branch lines to surrounding areas led to it becoming a small but busy railway centre providiing employmentfor a goodly number of railway workers.A number of new industries grew up,adding to the employment opportunities offered by local mines.At the present time, government policy encourages the growth of more industries,all assisted by good communications.To be found locally are a range of service industries,shops etc.,a large brewery,local authority services and offices.Nearby are several large industrial concerns,all providing a wide range of employment.
